p:
Chikungunya has a distribution similar to dengue with large epidemics in the Caribbean, South America, India, and Southeast Asia.
16 The clinical presentation is similar to classic dengue fever; however, arthralgia is more prominent. In the majority of cases, the arthralgia settles; 5% to 30% develop chronic arthropathy with pain, stiffness and swelling lasting months to years. 17, 18
